incidents.name: RCS Messaging Services Affected to Brazil Destinations

incident_updates.body: Twilio RCS Messaging Services was degraded for 35 minutes between 06:10 and 06:45 Pacific Time on 08/12/2025. During this period of time customers may have experienced 12400 Error codes when sending RCS Messages to Brazil. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Access to Admin Center May Fail Intermittently

incident_updates.body: The issue with the Twilio Console, where users intermittently see 'Access Denied' on the Twilio Admin (admin.twilio.com) page despite having appropriate access, has been resolved. The Twilio Admin (admin.twilio.com) page in the Twilio Console is now operating normally.

Twilio Admin (admin.twilio.com) page in Twilio Console now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing an issue with the Twilio Console where users intermittently see 'Access Denied' on the Twilio Admin (admin.twilio.com) page, even with appropriate access. Our engineers are actively working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue where admin access api is returning inconsistent values. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Issues When Start or Stop Voice Call Recordings and Streams

incident_updates.body: Twilio Voice call recordings and streams are now operating normally.

Twilio Voice call recordings and streams are now operating normally. Earlier, customers experienced difficulties in modifying in-progress calls and initiating new ones, in addition to the previously noted impacts.
We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Twilio Voice call recordings and streams are now operating normally. Earlier, customers experienced difficulties in modifying in-progress calls and initiating new ones, in addition to the previously noted impacts.

We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Some customers were unable to modify in progress calls, start or stop recordings, and would receive failures in attempting to initiate new calls. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption with Twilio Voice. Customers may be unable to start or stop voice call recordings and streams. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: WhatsApp Message Delivery Delays

incident_updates.body: We are no longer experiencing message delivery delays for messages sent via WhatsApp. This incident has been resolved.

We have started seeing recovery for the issue causing WhatsApp message delivery delays. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

WhatsApp message delivery is currently impacted due to elevated, intermittent errors from Meta. Affected WhatsApp messages are being retried, but are likely to experience delays in delivery, and some may fail if their validity period has expired. We are actively working with Meta to resolve this incident, and will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

WhatsApp message delivery is currently impacted due to elevated, intermittent errors from Meta. Affected WhatsApp messages are being retried, but are likely to experience delays in delivery, and some may fail if their validity period has expired. We are actively working with Meta to resolve this incident, and will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to experience message delivery delays for messages sent via WhatsApp. Our engineers are working with Meta to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
